00011 System::Void SpinachGUI::OrientationExport::Write()
00012 {
00013         String ^ FileText=gcnew String("");
00014 
00015         //If checkbox checked, write interaction matrix in  preview box
00016         FileText+=(checkBoxInteract->Checked?((OrientationDialog^ )orientation)->InteractionText : "")+"\r\n";
00017 
00018         //If checkbox checked, write eigen values in  preview box
00019         FileText+=(checkBoxEigen->Checked?((OrientationDialog^ )orientation)->EigenValuesText : "");
00020 
00021         //If checkbox checked, write eigen vectors in  preview box
00022         FileText+=(checkBoxEigenVector->Checked?((OrientationDialog^ )orientation)->EigenVectorsText : "")+"\r\n";
00023 
00024         //If checkbox checked, write axiality , rmombicity, skew etc in  preview box
00025         FileText+=(checkBoxConvention->Checked?((OrientationDialog^ )orientation)->ConventionsText : "");
00026 
00027         //If checkbox checked, write euler angles in  preview box
00028         FileText+=(checkBoxEuler->Checked?((OrientationDialog^ )orientation)->EulerAnglesText : "");
00029 
00030         //If checkbox checked, write quaternion parameters in  preview box
00031         FileText+=(checkBoxQuaternion->Checked?((OrientationDialog^ )orientation)->QuaternionText : "");
00032 
00033         //If checkbox checked, write angle axis parameters in  preview box
00034         FileText+=(checkBoxAngle->Checked?((OrientationDialog^ )orientation)->AngleAxisText : "")+"\r\n";
00035 
00036         //If checkbox checked, write spherical tensor matrix in  preview box
00037         FileText+=(checkBoxSpherical->Checked?((OrientationDialog^ )orientation)->SphericalTensorText : "")+"\r\n";
00038 
00039         //If checkbox checked, write Wigner matrix in  preview box
00040         FileText+=(checkBoxWigner->Checked?((OrientationDialog^ )orientation)->WignerMatrixText : "")+"\r\n";
00041 
00042         //Write final preview box
00043         PreviewtextBox->Text=FileText+"\r\n";
00044 }

00051 System::Void SpinachGUI::OrientationExport::Exportbutton_Click(System::Object^  sender, System::EventArgs^  e) 
00052 {
00053         //Setting the format and initialize filename for the save dialoguebox 
00054         ExportFileDialog->Filter="MatLab File|*.m";
00055         ExportFileDialog->FileName="InteractionID"+((OrientationDialog^ )orientation)->ID+".m";
00056 
00057         //Opens the save dialogue box and check if the OK button clicked then save to file
00058         if (ExportFileDialog->ShowDialog() == System::Windows::Forms::DialogResult::OK )
00059         {        
00060                 //Create export file
00061                 FileStream^ fs=gcnew FileStream(ExportFileDialog->FileName,FileMode::Create );
00062 
00063                 //Convert and write to file
00064                 array<Byte>^ info = (gcnew  System::Text::UTF8Encoding( true ))->GetBytes( PreviewtextBox->Text);
00065                 fs->Write( info, 0, info->Length  );
00066 
00067                 fs->Close();
00068         };
00069 }
